My personal congratulations also to the brother of the Emir of Qatar, His Highness Sheikh Tamim Bin Hamad Al-Thani, who leads his country with all skill and competence, and establishes a world-class position.

Our relationship with Qatar is the relationship of the brother to his brother .. Friend and friend .. We ask God to preserve the people of Qatar and the people of the Gulf and perpetuate our peoples progress and success
